idea-plugin.name: Winstone Integration Plugin(CE)
idea-plugin.change-notes:
ver1.3
- IDEA11 support (Ultimate, Community Edition integreated)
ver1.2
- IDEA9 support (Ultimate, Community Edition integreated)
- webappsDir option support
ver1.11
- IDEA9 Community Edition support
ver1.10
- IDEA8 support
- Winstone 0.9.10 is bundled(use CDDL-License).
- ApplicationComponent was deleted.
ver1.04
- The default value of CommonLibs is moved from 'config/plugins/winstone-plugin/' to 'system/plugins/winstone-plugin/'.
- Add a 'set working-directory' option.
ver1.03
- Add an open-browser option.
